name: All We Need Is Space
description:
You play as the white arrow. Use the arrow keys to move, interact and activate dialogue and go to the purple arrow to progress to the next page. If on mobile, swipe and tap.

A short (3 minute?) interactive story inspired by a short story I wrote two years ago.

My first Bitsy game. Had a lot of fun making it. Bitsy is an amazing game engine made by Adam LeDoux, if you haven't heard of it I recommend you check it out here: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
